item.title: What A Long Strange Trip It's Been
item.description: Just over four years ago, I impulsively responded to a Facebook post about a devops evangelism role at a new tech startup. I had never been an evangelist and I knew nothing of the term “devops”. #yolo ¯_(ツ)_/¯ This spontaneous act illuminated a path of personal and professional growth. A path that created new opportunities for me almost daily. A path that changed me for the better. A path that wasn’t there… until it was.
